price: Amma waɗanda suka bi Ubangijinsu da taƙawa sunã da Gidãjen Aljanna (waɗabda) ƙoramu ke gudãna a ƙarƙashinsu suna madawwama a cikinsu, a kan, liyãfa daga wurin Allah, kuma abin da ke wurin Allah ne mafi alhẽri ga barrantattu.
arabic: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا نُزُلٗا مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلۡأَبۡرَارِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lākini alladhīna ittaqaw rabbahum lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā nuzulan min ʿindi al-lahi wamā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun lil'abrāri
